name: Donna Taylor
text: The service today was absolutely the best.  Helpful, polite, friendly....just the best.  Thank you to everyone who took care of my late lunch needs.  Food was very good, atmosphere welcoming and clean. My waiter was top notch.

name: Christy Meeks
text: Hadn't got pizza hut carryout in a year or so....paid for a medium beef pizza...pretty much got a cheese pizza....I guess we'll go back to getting Dominoes pizza.

name: Michael McMichael
text: So it's very rare that I take the time to write a review (I believe this is my second) and I can't believe I'm writing a review for food I didn't even have, but this deserves it. ‚Ä¶More

text: 1245 in the afternoon my wife and I decided to swing in for  lunch buffet.  Close to Noon it should be good right, NO!!! No fresh pizza on the bar, No fresh breadsticks..NOTHING FRESH AND NOTHING GOT REPLENISHED AT MAIN LUNCH TIME!! ‚Ä¶More

text: Buffet well stocked ant they will make type of pizza if you ask. Staff nice and tables, floors etc  clean. I think food cools too quickly. I am just not as fond of their pizza so this is part of avg rating.

This place was Amazing! The food was great but the service is even better! They were super kind and checked in on us very often to make sure everything was okay. So this is my amazing experience.
Good Job Pizza Hut!

text: Wow. Is all I can say. Our server Eric? (I think that was his name) was absolutely amazing. He was patient with my kids when they ordered.
